original: Larson, Karl Ragnar Hugo, andre stadsläkare, Lidköping, f. 20/10/08 i Vetlanda av Hugo L. o. Greta Svensson. G. 38 m. Doris Nyqvist. Barn: Tom f. 39, Krister 42, Mats 44. — Studiex. v. nya elem:sk. i Sthlm 28, med. kand. i Upps. 33, med. lic. i Sthlm 38. Vist. i Paris f. stud. 33. Und :läk. v. Barnsjukh. i Gbg 38-39, v. Holter-manska sjukh. i Gbg 39, v. Svenshögens san. 40-45, v. Lidköp. las. med. avd. 45-47, andre stadsläk. i Lidköp. sed. 47. Läk. v. Lidköp. folksk., v. stadens ålderd :hem, vårdhem o. sin-nessjukavd. sed. 47. Hobbies: konst, filateli, jakt, fiske. FRKförtj :BM o. dipl. 43. ^Larsson, Carl Robert, landsfiskal, Bengtsfors, f. 30/8/83 i Frändefors, Älvsb. 1., av Lars Eriksson o. Margareta Eriksson. G. 17 m. folkskoll. Ellen Maria Lovisa Jansson. — Krono-länsm:ex. i Vänersb. 06. Tjg. å lands-kont. i Vänersb., förordn. s. tf. kro-nolänsm. i Ale, Flundre, Bjärke, Trollhättans o. Vedbo härads norra distr., landsfiskal i Lelångens distr. sed. 18. Led. av styr. f. Ensk. Bankens i Vä- nersb. -kont. i Bengtsfors, led. av kom-m:rev. i många år, överförmynd. i Äf-temarks-Bengtsfors distr.
translated:
Larson, Karl Ragnar Hugo, second municipal physician, Lidköping, b. 20/10/08 in Vetlanda to Hugo L. and Greta Svensson. Married in 1938 to Doris Nyqvist. Children: Tom b. 1939, Krister b. 1942, Mats b. 1944. Completed secondary school in Stockholm in 1928, obtained a Bachelor's degree in medicine in Uppsala in 1933, and a medical license in Stockholm in 1938. Studied in Paris as a student in 1933. Worked as an assistant physician at the Children's Hospital in Gothenburg from 1938-1939, at Holtermanska Hospital in Gothenburg in 1939, at Svenshögen Sanatorium from 1940-1945, at Lidköping County Hospital Medical Department from 1945-1947, and as a second municipal physician in Lidköping since 1947. Works as a physician at Lidköping Elementary School, the city's elderly home, nursing home, and mental health ward since 1947. Hobbies: art, philately, hunting, fishing. Earned the Royal Swedish Medal and diploma in 1943.

Larsson, Carl Robert, district attorney, Bengtsfors, b. 30/8/83 in Frändefors, Älvsborg County, to Lars Eriksson and Margareta Eriksson. Married at the age of 17 to Ellen Maria Lovisa Jansson, who attended elementary school. Completed the District Attorney Examination in Vänersborg in 1906. Served at the county office in Vänersborg, appointed as acting district attorney in the northern districts of Ale, Flundre, Bjärke, Trollhättan, and Vedbo, became district attorney in the Lelången district in 1918. Member of the board of the Enskilda Bank in Vänersborg's branch in Bengtsfors and member of the auditing committee for many years, served as a guardian in the Äftemarks-Bengtsfors district.
